channel.title: Bd killer the avenger/ unseen killer the vengeance
channel.description:
The Avenger
Blue dragon killer
Passives
Unending vengeance Immune to most occupation and redirection if you kill a member of the blue dragon you will commit suicide
Day ability 1 avenge target a dead player you will kill their kill tonight (1 use) cannot be used until day 5
Night ability 1 stalk if your target kills someone tonight attack them (3 uses)
Night ability 2 rebound if you die tonight kill your killer bypass death immunity healing and tornado (2 uses)
The vengeance
Unseen killer
Passives unending vengeance Immune to most occupation and redirection
Night ability 1 backstab if Target player visets someone you choose cause them to start bleeding causing them to die in one day (3 uses)
Night ability 2 revenge if the Assassin is killed tonight kill their killer (does not work with prince) (2 uses)
Both of these are unique

item.title: Bd killer the avenger/ unseen killer the vengeance
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Scl007:

Night ability 1 backstab if Target player visets someone you choose cause them to start bleeding causing them to die in one day (3 uses)

I like this

Kinda helps the prince meta to not be a thing.

Read full topic
item.source: Bd killer the avenger/ unseen killer the vengeance

item.title: Bd killer the avenger/ unseen killer the vengeance
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Then the passives are in the wrong classes.

You should prob change that so people don’t get confused.

Read full topic

item.title: Bd killer the avenger/ unseen killer the vengeance
item.dc:creator: Scl007
item.description:
Note that the avenger is the only one who commits suicide not the vengeance

(Plus avenger sounds cool cause you can call it the ardint Avenger)

item.title: Bd killer the avenger/ unseen killer the vengeance
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Scl007:

Day ability 1 avenge target a dead player you will kill their kill tonight (1 use) cannot be used until day 5

Would say first for plain english “You will kill their killer” might be easier to understand.

secondly that’s kinda OP

item.title: Bd killer the avenger/ unseen killer the vengeance
item.dc:creator: justaneut
item.description:
prehaps give the avenger a debuff stating if you kill any blue dragon mebers with your abilities you will commit suicide because there are some bd that could kill and btw how would this work with the voting system and avenge would the first one who voted him up be acused of killing him and therefore die if you use this on the dead body or can you only use it on players who died at night?
also prehaps change backstab to were you use it on a unseen meber if anyone visited him that night he would be caused to bleed causing them to die in two days -2 uses

Read full topic

item.title: Bd killer the avenger/ unseen killer the vengeance
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
I think it kills the player who killed the dead player

Scl007:

Night ability 1 backstab if Target player attacks someone cause them to start bleeding causing them to die in one day

Night ability 2 revenge if the Assassin is killed tonight kill their killer (does not work with prince)

Also these both unlimited?

Read full topic

item.title: Bd killer the avenger/ unseen killer the vengeance
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Scl007:

Day ability 1 avenge target a dead player you will kill their kill tonight (1 use)

I mean it’s a free almost guaranteed evil kill. Basically do this D2/D3 and rip assassin/CL

Scl007:

Night ability 1 stalk if your target kills someone tonight attack them (3 uses)

Also rip prince
